channel.title: Emote interface
channel.description:
Hey im looking to change the emote interface on my client .. from the emote one is usually is (with teleports in the emote tabs) to a emote tab with actual emotes like this -
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/emoteinterface.jpg[/img]
because i am planning on using just normal telleports without using a delta base.
any help much appreaciated , -lewis.
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/BAMFBanner.gif[/img]
